data.name: Global AI Community - On virtual tour
data.description: On the 8th of April 2020 the Global AI Community is hosting a 30 hour live event across timezones in different languages. Mark the date in your calender, subscribe to our YouTube channel and tune in.

relatedRecords.name: InfluxDays N. America Virtual Experience
relatedRecords.description: Join us for InfluxDays North America Virtual Experience 2020, on November 10-11. InfluxDays is the only event focused on time series data.

relatedRecords.name: OpML'20
relatedRecords.description: The 2020 USENIX Conference on Operational Machine Learning (OpML ’20) will take place on May 1, 2020, at the Hyatt Regency Santa Clara in Santa Clara, CA, USA.
